snippet.title: MetaChampions. Teaser
snippet.description:
We’re back with some important news. The project’s name has been changed to MetaChampions. We can no longer mention our champions’ original game for legal reasons. But we do get to keep their original names.

Our team apologizes for any inconvenience. We had no intention of deceiving or misleading anyone. All we want is to bring once-lost heroes back to those who still remember them. And to introduce them to new players. To see them fight once more under your command.

We will share the release’s new date very soon. The game will be available for free, first on Nintendo Switch and later on other platforms. Subscribe to our news to stay tuned. And tell your friends that the legendary heroes are ready to return to the battlefield and meet across the board in MetaChampions!

Join us:
Discord server: https://discord.gg/vnZHRUh
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MetaChampions
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MetaChampions/?modal=admin_todo_tour
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MetaChampions/
ВК: https://vk.com/metachampions

Music: "We Need a Hero" by David Fesliyan
